content:
Yes! Beijing has a variety of sweet treats and desserts worth trying. Here are some popular options:

1. Tanghulu (糖葫芦) - a traditional Beijing snack made from skewered and candied hawthorn berries.
2. Fried sesame balls (炸芝麻球) - deep-fried glutinous sesame balls filled with sweet bean paste or crushed peanuts.
3. Beijing-style yogurt (老北京酸奶) - a tangy and creamy yogurt that is typically served with toppings like fruit and granola.
4. Nai Laoban (奶老板) - a sweet, creamy, and cooling beverage made from milk, fermented mashed grains, and sugar.
5. Mung bean cake (绿豆糕) - a traditional steamed cake made from mung bean flour, sugar, and often filled with red bean paste.

These are just a few of the many dessert options available in Beijing.
